00043   const char *usage_str =
00044   "\n" \
00045   "usage: rsclient [OPTIONS] <host>[:<port>]\n" \
00046   "\n" \
00047   "OPTIONS";
00048 
00052   void build_inet_address(struct sockaddr_in &addr, PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, std::string &location) {
00053     std::string host;
00054     uint16_t port;
00055     size_t colon_offset;
00056 
00057     if ((colon_offset = location.find(":")) == string::npos) {
00058       host = location;
00059       port = (uint16_t)props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.RangeServer.Port", 38060);
00060     }
00061     else {
00062       host = location.substr(0, colon_offset);
00063       port = atoi(location.substr(colon_offset+1).c_str());
00064     }
00065 
00066     memset(&addr, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00067     {
00068       struct hostent *he = gethostbyname(host.c_str());
00069       if (he == 0) {
00070         herror(host.c_str());
00071         exit(1);
00072       }
00073       memcpy(&addr.sin_addr.s_addr, he->h_addr_list[0], sizeof(uint32_t));
00074     }
00075     addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00076     addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00077   }
00078 
00079   class NullDispatchHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00080   public:
00081     virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) { return; }
00082   };
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00086 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00087   CommandShellPtr shell;
00088   CommandInterpreterPtr interp;
00089   string cfgfile = "";
00090   Comm *comm = 0;
00091   int error = 1;
00092   Hyperspace::SessionPtr hyperspace;
00093   RangeServerClientPtr client;
00094   struct sockaddr_in addr;
00095   DispatchHandlerPtr null_handler_ptr = new NullDispatchHandler();
00096   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00097   std::string location_str;
00098 
00099   try {
00100     Config::Desc generic(usage_str);
00101     CommandShell::add_options(generic);
00102 
00103     // Hidden options: server location
00104     Config::Desc hidden("Hidden options");
00105     hidden.add_options()
00106       ("server-location", Config::value<string>(), "server location");
00107 
00108     Config::PositionalDesc p;
00109     p.add("server-location", -1);
00110 
00111     Config::init_with_comm(argc, argv, &generic, &hidden, &p);
00112 
00113     if (Config::varmap.count("server-location") == 0) {
00114       cout << Config::description() << "\n";
00115       return 1;
00116     }
00117 
00118     props_ptr = new Properties(Config::cfgfile);
00119 
00120     location_str = Config::varmap["server-location"].as<string>();
00121 
00122     build_inet_address(addr, props_ptr, location_str);
00123 
00124     comm = Comm::instance();
00125 
00126     // Create Range Server client object
00127     client = new RangeServerClient(comm, 30);
00128 
00129     // connect to RangeServer
00130     if ((error = comm->connect(addr, null_handler_ptr)) != Error::OK) {
00131       cerr << "error: unable to connect to RangeServer at " << endl;
00132       exit(1);
00133     }
00134 
00135     // Connect to Hyperspace
00136     hyperspace = new Hyperspace::Session(comm, props_ptr, 0);
00137     if (!hyperspace->wait_for_connection(30))
00138       exit(1);
00139 
00140     interp = new RangeServerCommandInterpreter(comm, hyperspace, addr, client);
00141 
00142     shell = new CommandShell("rsclient", interp, Config::varmap);
00143 
00144     error = shell->run();
00145   }
00146   catch (Exception &e) {
00147     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00148   }
00149   catch(exception& e) {
00150     HT_ERROR_OUT << e.what() << HT_END;
00151   }
00152 
00153   return error;
00154 }
